name: What's your life worth
description:
What's your life worth?

Fight your way through a dungeon filled with skeletons and zombies! Use the bow you find and the magical fountains in each chamber to get all the way to the last boss.

Beware when choosing upgrades from the fountain - they will use your hp!

Game was made as a project for the game mechanics course at DAE, Belgium.

WASD to move
E to interact
Left click for base attack
Right click for special attack (obtained later in game)
